name: A Thousand Questions
description: An interactive web application providing icebreaker-style questions for conversations, team-building, and social gatherings. Features category filtering, social sharing, and a clean, lightweight interface.

name: Monthly Bedtime Serial
description: A fully automated, month-long bedtime story generator and publisher. Each day, a new ~20-minute chapter is generated using the OpenAI API, posted to a static site hosted via GitHub Pages, and archived every 30 days with brand-new concepts, characters, and plots.

name: Soccer Positioning Game
description: A simple 2D soccer positioning game where players select a role, position themselves on the field, and receive a score based on their positioning. Not built by a soccer pro.

name: Theo's Urban Garden
description: A cozy, browser-based, 2D farming tycoon game with 8-bit pixel art, grid-based gameplay, and idle mechanics. Play as Theo, a gardener growing and selling crops to grocery storesâ€”starting small with carrots and working up to rare crops and larger farms.

name: Snake to Learn
description: A classic Snake game implementation built from scratch using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Demonstrates fundamental web development concepts when learning the basics. Not from template or class project.

name: Home Care Tracker
description: A focused, lightweight webapp for generating and tracking a personalized home maintenance schedule. Helps homeowners stay on top of routine tasks and preventive maintenance.

name: mjt.pub API Backend
description: A modular Django + DRF backend used by multiple personal projects. A shared tool-belt that can power many apps without data collisions, providing RESTful APIs for authentication, data storage, and business logic.

name: Color Web App
description: A responsive generative art web application that creates color-themed designs using extracted color palettes. Explore beautiful color combinations and generative patterns.

name: The Last Pupper
description: A simple site hosting a 'Last Supper' image with dogs. Not my artwork, just a domain I couldn't resist buying. Pastor approved.

name: Playful Button
description: A simple web-based game where users click a playful, moving button to increase their score. Includes difficulty levels, lives, and a playful UI. My first ever coding-assistant project experiment.

name: Bible Speak Chrome Extension
description: A Chrome extension that scans webpages for BibleSpeak.org pronunciations and injects phonetic pronunciation guides directly into the page. Helps with biblical name pronunciation while reading online.

name: Notable Joy
description: A site for a prototyped idea: fun, uplifting notes printed on business cards, meant to be handed to others as a touch of joy in their day. A simple concept for spreading positivity.

name: PDF Merger
description: A simple drag-and-click desktop application for merging PDF files, built with Python and Tkinter. Provides an easy-to-use GUI for combining multiple PDFs into a single document.
